1.name: Skill unlocked
1.desc: Unlock |C:0xffb82a&T:3| slots available to study in Godhood Skills

2.name: Protection Skin
2.desc: Activate Protection Morph feature. Protection will surround the character to block |C:0xffb82a&T:10%| of the damage taken

3.name: Magic Shield
3.desc: Protection Point increases by |C:0xffb82a&T:1000000|. |C:0xffb82a&T:25%| of all taken damage will be negated by the shield

4.name: Advance Skill
4.desc: Unlock |C:0xffb82a&T:2| slots for skills and unlock the purchase features of the remaining |C:0xffb82a&T:3| slots of skills

5.name: Holy Shield
5.desc: Protection Point increases by |C:0xffb82a&T:2000000|, when HP is lower than |C:0xffb82a&T:50%|, restores Shield by |C:0xffb82a&T:25%|. CD: |C:0xffb82a&T:20s|

6.name: Holy Blessing
6.desc: Protection Point increases by |C:0xffb82a&T:5000000|, when HP is lower than |C:0xffb82a&T:30%|, restores Shield by |C:0xffb82a&T:50%|. CD:|C:0xffb82a&T:20s|

7.name: Shield Counterattack
7.desc: When own shield is broken, it will give out shockwave, dealing to the |C:0xffb82a&T:4| surrounding units with |C:0xffb82a&T:250%| damage
